column4: can please someone help me to install compiz fusion on my hp dv2000???
I believe you can just sudo apt-get install compiz-fusion, if your video card supports it
Possibly, some googling should find out if you are supported easily, but I think compiz fusion is installed by default on Gutsy if your card supports it...I might be wrong though
I know it was installed by default on my lappy as it's cars is supported, and not on my desktop as its card is not
